# Water Breathing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (short reed or piece of straw)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creatures touched

**Duration:** 2 hours/level; see text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 368

The transmuted creatures can breathe water freely. Divide the duration evenly among all the creatures you touch. The spell does not make creatures unable to breathe air.
